Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesJob Description :- Degree in Computer Science or relevant experience- 4-8 years of relevant hands-on software engineering experience doing software design and development.- Good command over at least one JavaScript frameworks like React.js, Vue.js or Angular- Sound knowledge in HTML, CSS, ES6 and Typescript concepts.- A team player with good communication skills.- Work in a fast-paced environment and make pragmatic engineering decisions in a short amount of time.- Knowledge of React with any GraphQL client is plus.- Having good knowledge in version control flows (GIT) is plus.
UG: B.Sc in Computers, BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers
